step1Title: Join our Waiting List and earn big cash & win amazing prizes by referring your friends and completing fun activities.
step1UserExist: You have already joined our waiting list
step2Text: We sent a code for you to confirm your e-mail account.
step3Text: You're officially in the sweetest deal in town. Stay tunned for all the juicy updates joining our Telegram group.
AboutParagraph1: TreatCoin is a platform created to provide a new social experience of digital consuming focused on rewarding our users with big money, while offering the best value for the companies that collaborate with us. We believe time is the most precious resource we have, and TreatCoin is here to allow you to monetize your online presence in a fun and profitable way.
AboutParagraph2: We designed the platform to treat our users every step of the way. In TreatCoin, you can never lose – only gain. From referring friends to completing fun activities you would do anyway, every action is rewarded with Treat Coins that can win you amazing prizes and are worth money. The more you gain, the more it will earn for you!
AboutParagraph3: Join TreatCoin and start making your time online (and offline as well!) rewarding.
MissionText1: TreatCoin is a platform that creates a brand-new social experience of digital consuming, where both the client and the business earn more.
MissionText2: TreatCoin’s mission is to allow users to enjoy doing their everyday online actions and earn money for it, and thus provide happier, more engaged and better valued clients to the companies we collaborate with.
MissionText3: With TreatCoin, being online is more rewarding than ever.
